definition: used in the construction 以...為例|以...为例, "to take ... as an example"
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
not to be repeated/not to be taken as a precedent/just this once

sentences.english: Finally, an application example of excavator design was proposed to illuminate the reconstruction of traditional functions.
sentences.chinese: 最后，以挖掘机设计目标为例，进行了函数改造说明。

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言为例，考察其若干方言词义。

sentences.english: Let us take, for example, Rizzo's discussion of the Good Samaritan problem.
sentences.chinese: 让我们以里索讨论的好撒玛利亚人问题为例。

sentences.english: As an example of deaerator system, the basic modularization modeling method is presented.
sentences.chinese: 以除氧器系统为例，给出了模块化建模基本方法。

sentences.english: Take a woman with a 27-inch waist.
sentences.chinese: 以一位腰围27英寸的女士为例。

sentences.english: Based on the practical example, the methods of this paper are proved to be feasibility and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论文以乌龙山隧道为例，进行实例分析和计算。

sentences.english: Take the example of drip irrigation for small farmers in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 以供墨西哥个体农民使用的滴灌为例。

sentences.english: In the case of the Earth, the amount of sunlight absorbed is 239 watts per square metre.
sentences.chinese: 以地球为例，每平米的阳光吸收量为239瓦特。

sentences.english: Taking a four bar linkage for example, the KED analysis is conducted.
sentences.chinese: 以四杆较接机构为例，进行了KED分析。

sentences.english: He cited Ningbo in East China's Zhejiang Province as an example.
sentences.chinese: 他以浙江省宁波市为例做了说明。

sentences.english: As an example, Chengdu city information port construction is provided .
sentences.chinese: 以成都市为例，提出都市信息港建设的框架结构。

sentences.english: Taking the tractor-plough combination as an example, several conclusions have been made.
sentences.chinese: 并以犁耕机组为例，得出了某些结论。

sentences.english: This paper carried on the preliminary discussion on this question taking linfen as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以临汾市为例，就此问题进行了初步探讨。

sentences.english: Take compressor's intercooler for example, main reasons of failure is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以压缩机管壳式冷却器为例，分析了其失效原因。

sentences.english: The stability of standing and self-excited swing is discussed as example.
sentences.chinese: 以人体的站立稳定性和自激摆动为例。

sentences.english: The reason of pollution was analyzed and the countermeasures wasp uts forward.
sentences.chinese: 以广通河为例提出水体污染形成的原因及防治对策。

definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
